bill_title: restrict certain penalties for pesticide applicators.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to restrict certain penalties for pesticide applicators. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 38-21 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No pesticide license or certification issued pursuant to this chapter may be suspended or modified under § 38-21-44 in a manner that creates any probation or curtailment that is more than one year in duration. The provisions of this section apply only to the first offense committed by the licensee or certificate holder. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
